name: Maxwell Bentil
bio: Mr. Maxwell Bentil is a Development Planning and Management professional with over five years of experience in public sector planning, project coordination, and organizational development. He holds a Masterâ€™s degree in Planning from KNUST and has worked with organizations including MATT-MARI Rescue Foundation, Cocoa Marketing Company, Kumasi Metropolitan Assembly, and the Ghana Statistical Service. Passionate about project management and development analysis, Maxwell is known for his adaptability and results-driven approach.
